name: rankbnd
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1
body: |- wb(wral(s0, c0, wss(csuc(cfv(crnk, cv(s0))), c1)), wss(cfv(crnk, c0), c1))

comment: The rank of a set is bounded by a bound for the successor of its members. (Contributed by NM, 18-Sep-2006.)
